state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to try to venture north. After that, head east. That done, go to the east. Next, attempt to travel north. And then, travel west. That done, head south. With that accomplished, make an effort to head west. After that, make an effort to take a trip north. Then, attempt to head west. And then, head north. Then, try to move east. If you can succeed at that, go north. And then, take a trip west. Okay, and then, make an effort to take a trip north. That done, pick up the coin from the floor of the scullery. Got that? Good! -= Chamber =- You arrive in a chamber. An ordinary kind of place. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Chamber =-0/1
